title: #50 Shima Oliaee (Dolly Parton's America): Fake cousins, lazy exorcists, punching down
itunes:title: Shima Oliaee (Dolly Parton's America): Fake cousins, lazy exorcists, punching down
description:
Radio journalist Shima Oliaee, known for her many contributions to podcasts like Radiolab and for co-creating the award-winning series Dolly Parton's America, is also an avowed fan of poetry and taking time offline to sit and read ... but like the rest of us, she's online, and today on Follow Friday, Shima shares four of her favorite people to follow:
Someone she just started following: https://twitter.com/drninaansary (Nina Ansary)
Someone super-talented who's still under the radar: https://twitter.com/ingrid_rojas_c (Ingrid Rojas Contreras)
Someone who makes her laugh: https://twitter.com/KieseLaymon (Kiese Laymon)
Someone who makes the internet a better place: https://twitter.com/rgay/ (Roxane Gay)

And on https://www.patreon.com/followfriday (our Patreon page), you can pledge any amount of money to get access to Follow Friday XL — our members-only podcast feed with exclusive bonus follows. That feed has an extended-length version of this interview in which Shima talks about someone she's jealous of, the writer and professor Imani Perry.
Also:
Follow Shima @ShimaOliaee on https://twitter.com/ShimaOliaee/ (Twitter) and https://www.instagram.com/shimaoliaee/ (Instagram)
Follow us @FollowFridayPod on https://twitter.com/followfridaypod (Twitter) and https://www.instagram.com/followfridaypod/ (Instagram)
Follow Eric https://twitter.com/HeyHeyESJ (@heyheyesj) on Twitter

Theme song written by Eric Johnson, and performed by https://www.fiverr.com/yonamarie (Yona Marie). Show art by https://www.fiverr.com/dodiihr (Dodi Hermawan).
Thank you to our amazing patrons: Jon, Justin, Amy, Yoichi, Elizabeth, Sylnai, and Matthias
